name: SpiderUp
description:
Intro

Spider Up is a Third-Person Single-Player game. 

The player controls a spider and seeks out babies spider to build up spider team, then bring them back to the nest.

        Pillars
  • The Player will control a spider that has abilities to shoot webs.
  • Touch the small spider to grow your spider team.
  • Learn some new stuff from this game.
       Feature
  • Play as a spider
  • Team up spider
  • Dense spider
  • Shoot webs
      Control

The game currently does not support console.

    Credits

Xiangkai Song - Programming, Level 1-2, UI, Audio

Yash Hasmukhkumar Raval - Level Art, Character Art, Level 3-4
